price: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Ku tuna ni'imar Allah a kanku a lõkacin da wasu mutãne suka yi niyyar su shimfiɗa hannuwansu zuwa gare ku* sai Ya kange hannuwansu daga gare ku, kuma ku bi Allah da taƙawa. Kuma sai muminai su dogara ga Allah kawai.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ هَمَّ قَوۡمٌ أَن يَبۡسُطُوٓاْ إِلَيۡكُمۡ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ فَكَفَّ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ عَنكُمۡۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: * Wannan kiyãyewa ya auku a wurãre da yawa tun Musulmi suna da rauni kuma kãfirai suna da ƙarfi, kuma suna son su kashe Musulmi da Musulunci. Allah Ya tsare su. Saboda haka yanzu da Musulmi suka yi ƙarfi da ƙarfin Allah, yã wajaba a kansu su godewa Allah da taƙawa. Watau su riƙe alkawarin Allah, su yi abin da Ya aza musu gwargwadon hãli.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū udh'kurū niʿ'mata al-lahi ʿalaykum idh hamma qawmun an yabsuṭū ilaykum aydiyahum fakaffa aydiyahum ʿankum wa-ittaqū al-laha waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
